website_summaries.verdict: The Olympus Stylus Tough 8010 is rugged on the outside, but average on the inside.
pros: 1.6GB of internal memory for photos, video

customer_reviews.title: and both of them worked great! With the first one
customer_reviews.text: Our second Olympus 8010, and both of them worked great! With the first one, I was truly amazed that you begin by cleaning the camera in a bowl of clean water ... amazing. The only reason that I bought a 2nd one, is because, for my next vacation, I washed the camera in a clean bowl of water -- but, also opened the battery/SD door, too -- totally my fault, and was laughable until I remembered the price: hahaha. Excellent camera, with great snorkeling, zip lining, posing, scenery and action vacation photos. Don't forget to also get (and use!) the "floatie" device that helps you to find your camera, once you drop it from your kayak.
customer_reviews.author: scoutdad

customer_reviews.title: Lacks External Charger
customer_reviews.text: This camera follows in the Tough Line but lacks an external charger. USB charging only which leaves the battery door and seals open while charging. Big risk to it's toughness. E-Force City sells an external charger and battery for under $12. One would have thought Olympus could have done this.  Or the charger alone
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for vacation
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera. The underwater feature of course I fantastic but it also has no problem with the clarity of photos. I was worried about water spots collecting but it rarely ever happened and if it did you could easily just wipe the front lens off. The battery life is great in this camera too. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Mae

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I expected better results for the price. This camera is practically useless. Many pictures came out blurry even though I was holding the camera super still. The flash is worthless. It flashes so bright that it drowns out the picture. I took a close-up picture of a part in a dim area to get a model/serial number. The flash drowned out the entire picture where I couldn't even see the object - just white light! Then I pulled out my HTC Windows phone and snapped a picture and it came out perfect. I bought this camera specifically for waterproof, but what good is that if the camera can't take a decent picture? Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: it's a great camera buuuuutttt.....
customer_reviews.text: I own other Olympus Stylus cameras. As far as it being waterproof,freeze proof, tough, blah blah blah... yup all of that is true and it's a great camera. BUT the downloading of the pictures onto the computer is endless and when you download a video? I hope you have plenty of time... Watching the video you download is another issue. If and when you ever get to watch it, it will freeze up your computer and you have to start all over again. I did not return the camera, it takes great pictures, instead, I download my pictures to another application instead of the "IB" it comes with.
customer_reviews.author: tealeyez

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: Please see other review for accessories. I truly cannot say enough for this camera. It went to Afghanistan with the Marines, came back battered, but still working. It matched the claims made for it. If you really want a great camera that goes through sand, rain, ice, being thrown into a duffel bag with gear, etc., this is the one. The only thing it missed out on, was being shot.
customer_reviews.author: D L.Tobias

customer_reviews.title: not satisfied
customer_reviews.text: i must say that the photo and video quality are very good but i am not satisfied with the scene selection speed, when it auto selects the scene and focus to program the shot, it's too slow (a second maybe) When you point to a movement shot it s an eternity. it's tough as said, strong case, silver finished. I used under water with no problem but i must say once i used in salt water, menu buttons began to loose their silver finishing turning into white.
customer_reviews.author: Paul H

customer_reviews.title: Good Camera nice pictures
customer_reviews.text: Good Camera nice pictures. is water prof and is my favorite camera, but the movies recoded are not compatible. if you share the Memory card. you will see a question mark instead of the movie and will nor run. hope they fix that. and It will not keep the setting. I set the AUTO position if you shot off the camera will not come back the same setting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good waterproof camera
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I purchased this to take on our honeymoon cruise. We took underwater pictures snorkeling, swimming with dolphins and parasailing and didn't have to worry about getting it wet. It took great pictures, even under water! I'm very glad we had it for the cruise but now we don't have much use for it. After taking a picture, the camera takes about 10 seconds to clear the picture and be ready to take another one. It also takes about 10 seconds to boot up when you first turn it on. Its verrrry slow... But it was nice for water activities.
customer_reviews.author: gwoody

customer_reviews.title: Takes a beating
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for a year now and it has been dropped and is always with me in the water and not a single problem. The picture quality is good and it allows me to take pictures i never could take with any of my other cameras. Though I can not prove this; I believe the bright chrome finish on this camera draws the fish, manatees and dolphin in. The rear screen is bright enough to be seen in bright FL sun and in many different water conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis M

customer_reviews.title: Great but after 2 years the seals dosent work good and water cames in
customer_reviews.text: Great but after 2 years the seals dosent work good and water cames in
customer_reviews.author: GBM2012

customer_reviews.title: Love my camera
customer_reviews.text: I'm not very tech savvy. I needed a camera to take on caribbean vacations that was able to get wet. This does the job but I wouldn't keep it submerged for more than a minute or two, contrary to what the instructions say the camera can handle. Also, rinse with fresh water as soon as possible. It gets a little finiky if its not immediately rinsed and dried. It hasnt lost any pictures but it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: QueenOndine

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Camera / Poor Battery
customer_reviews.text: This camera is great in every way except for the battery life. I took it with me to Acadia National Park in Maine and I was completely disappointed by how SHORT battery life is! If you plan to take a lot of pictures with flash filler to brighten the face, spend an extra $17.99 on a spare battery. Fortunately, I've a USB port in my minivan to recharge it. I'm not sure if the seller gave me an old battery or I'm over-using the flash filler, but com'on. Don't die on me so soon!
customer_reviews.author: KSor

customer_reviews.title: Great all around point and shoot camera.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for traveling. i wanted something I could take anywhere and this was perfect. I took it the beach with no problems in the water, out in cold temperatures and more. When I bought it was at a great price, its probably cheaper now which is even better. I did not want to spend too much money on one of these rugged cameras in case it got lost.
customer_reviews.author: Jtomage

customer_reviews.title: Great camera, great pictures
customer_reviews.text: Great camera, great pictures... I dislike that it takes so long to actually start after pushing the on button. It is almost as if it has to go through a set up sequence. I would still buy this again though. It is a workable camera.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Love my Stylus Tough!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new olympus stylus tough. Its exactly what I needed in a camera. I needed a camera that would hold up to taking photos outdoors in all kinds of circumstances. I like to take it with me when I'm riding my 4wheeler. With this camera, I don't have to worry if it gets a little wet or if it gets shaken around a little. It's great for indoor photos too! It has all kinds of selections to choose from. It's a great camera!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: A must have for vacations!
customer_reviews.text: We use this in our pool and on every vacation! We have taken it diving, snorkeling, and all around the Caribbean!
customer_reviews.author: Ninja Mom of 2

customer_reviews.title: works like it should
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a photography person, or a camera guy. I am an adventure guy, and so far this thing has really survived anything ive put it into. From Natural Hot Springs, to freezing cold waters this has held up perfectly. It also survived a bad catch when my buddy decided to throw it off a cliff. its a little scratched, but it works! The panoramic comes out great, and ive taken it 25ft deep scuba diving, held up no prob. I would recommend this camera if your looking for an uncomplicated point and shoot camera.
customer_reviews.author: curtis

customer_reviews.title: Horrible focus problems
customer_reviews.text: This camera has major problems with focus. I've purchased two waterproof Olympus products, this one and the prior model. The prior model had absolutely no focus issues. However, this camera, particularly when attempting to focus on objects far away, cannot focus. I recently took it on a trip to Asia and lost about a quarter of my pictures because of this. Not at all worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Best underwater camera there is for even close to the ...
customer_reviews.text: Best underwater camera there is for even close to the price. My family owns 3 Our first one lasted for years under extreme use and the others are still working great
customer_reviews.author: louis F

customer_reviews.title: Slightly better than the previous model
customer_reviews.text: I owned the previous model and I really liked it, but unfortunately it was stolen. So I decided to go for this newer model then. I really like the fact that it's a sturdy camera and also waterproof. HD video is awesome. The pictures are not great, but they usually come out OK. The biggest issue for me though is the slowliness. Sometimes I miss some great shots because the camera takes to long to start and between shots. Another problem is that the camera freezes sometimes, and then I have to remove the battery and put it back again.
customer_reviews.author: MARIANA CIAMPONE

customer_reviews.title: 3rd time's a charm
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd one of these cameras that my son has had. He has ruined them simply by using them to death. The first one he had out with his job on a 1000' ship and he simply beat it to a pulp by using it so much. The 2nd one he opened under water in Belize...duh. He still asked for this same camera for Christmas...must be a good one!!
customer_reviews.author: Meg from BG

customer_reviews.title: Good, tough camera
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this camera for about 6 months and still like it. I don't love it, but I like it, and it's held up to being dropped, chewed by my dogs, and I've used it several times under water. Add to the fact you can buy a reasonably priced dive case for it, and I have to say I'm more than pleased. I still wish Cannon could turn out a camera this tough and versatile.
customer_reviews.author: K. S.

customer_reviews.title: Olympus 8010
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for a trip to Ecuador after purchasing two others that I returned, the Vivitar and the Pentax. This one was definitely much better. The pictures were clear, it worked beautifully underwater. I took it down to only about 10 feet though. I would have liked a bigger zoom, but this one beat out all the competition for an underwater camera. It's small size was great to put in my pocket. I ended up using it on most days rather than my larger Olympus C740. It takes great close-ups with the macro lens too. I am extremely pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Florence Dickie

customer_reviews.title: awesome sports/outdoors camera!
customer_reviews.text: Not only did I buy this awesome outdoor camera for myself, but I recommend it to 3 other friends of mine and they bought it and are enjoying it as well! It is an amazing camera no matter where you are and takes wonderful underwater pictures. I compare the picture quality to my Sony Cybershot and it's just as good if not better. Obviously I would definitely recommend this camera.
customer_reviews.author: E. Nixon

customer_reviews.title: Not my first choise but so glad I bought it
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Olympus Stylus Tough 8010 because I was going on vacation and new I was going to be using it at the beach. I haven't dropped it yet but all the pictures we took came out amazing including the ones under water and the videos of the coral reef while snorkeling were beautiful will definitely recommend, the price was also very good.
customer_reviews.author: Z Espinal, Mass

customer_reviews.title: it does what it says
customer_reviews.text: It really is shock proof, waterproof & cold proof. I've had one for over 5 years & have used it on every vacation. I purchased this one to send with my hubby to Afghanistan. It worked great!! There is a lot of sand over there & he wanted a durable camera that could take the sand. He washes this one from time & it's been great.
customer_reviews.author: BambiWatson

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: The camera has a good look and feel, it's very rugged and the weight is just right. Now, what really disappointed me was the auto-focus feature. It doesn't perform well under low light, specially indoors. You have to make several attempts to get the camera to focus. Also the menus are not user friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Damian Comisso

customer_reviews.title: poor image quality
customer_reviews.text: The image quality is considerably lower than other point and shoots within the same price range The auto mode does not work at all in low light conditions, you need to manually configure it to get a shot, it also uses a preflash for autofocusing that is annoyinh and makes me close my eyes before the actual photo is taken the only good thing is the underwater feature
customer_reviews.author: Alberto

customer_reviews.title: It's good for a waterproof, rugged camera.
customer_reviews.text: It does what it's advertised to do. It's doesn't take amazing pictures unless you really play around with the settings. If you let the battery get too low it will start to misbehave and leave your pictures out of focus. But for the most part, it is super reliable and does a great job. Haven't had any waterproof issues. You just need to be sure to take care of it like the instructions say.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie F.

customer_reviews.title: Stop working after some uses
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera last year of August, but rarely use it. Up to now I used only three times, that is when I go with family for vacations. Last month the camera stopped working. Every time I turn on the camera, it turns on just a few seconds and then shutdown. I checked online but never see a solution for this. What should I do with it now but throwing to the gabbage?
customer_reviews.author: Nguyen Trung Ky

customer_reviews.title: for my wife
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for my wife. She loves the beach. She doesn't use half the features available. It's strong, durable, and water resistant. I have to remind her to clean the lens of salt. She has had no problems with sand or water. She can take very good pictures where I wouldn't dare bring my $2000 camera.
customer_reviews.author: nanmka

customer_reviews.title: Works for what I needed it for!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera to go on a cruise. One of the excursions was a water excursion, so I didn't want to take my regular camera. It worked great for what I needed it for! There are tons of picture options for indoor, outdoor, nighttime, candle light, food, etc. etc. etc. The only thing I would say is that sometimes the pictures were blurry, but it wasn't worth taking a star away.
customer_reviews.author: The Mrs.

customer_reviews.title: My 3rd Olympus - All great!
customer_reviews.text: This is my third Olympus camera. A weather proof Stylus 410, it still works well. Then an upgrade to a waterproof to 10' Stylus Tough 6000, a super camera that someone stole from me. This lastest one is the Olympus Stylus Tough 8010 14MP Digital Camera with 5x Wide Angle Zoom and 2.7 inch LCD (Blue). It has maintained the quality of the previous ones with added features of 14MP, waterproof to 30' and increased internal memory. The great thing also that it was about the same price as the original camera I had. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: DWC Tampa

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera has gotten a lot of bad reviews for it's speed....I have a very nice Nikon camera and it performs like it should...that being said you get what you pay for. It is slower than my Nikon, but is also a fraction of the price. We wanted a camera that takes good pictures, is durable, and easy to travel with-and it's everything we wanted. If you want a camera that has the speed and features of an expensive camera-you have to buy the expensive camera :)
customer_reviews.author: Mommy R.N.

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: got this for my hubby. We hike and camp a lot and he wanted something that he didn't have to worry about breaking. So far we have used it at the river and in the swimming pool and it's been great. Been dropped once or twice with no damage.
customer_reviews.author: TJ Michaud

customer_reviews.title: Not tough
customer_reviews.text: There's an awkward metal lens cover that pops up and down, uses battery, and stops working after a few months. I dropped the camera and the lens broke, so... it's not tough enough, not even much tougher than a regular camera. I wish I had saved the warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Reginald H. Henderson

customer_reviews.title: is good. Picture quality leaves something to be desired - ...
customer_reviews.text: Ability to withstand drops/water/etc. is good. Picture quality leaves something to be desired - not as clear as I would like - still trying to decide if it's worth loosing picture quality for the sake of durability.
customer_reviews.author: J. Charpie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Don't use often but like battery charging when ready quick to charge
customer_reviews.author: JLL

customer_reviews.title: Great water camera
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a reasonably priced submersible camera to take on our cruise. Had this Olympus for 8 days in the Carribean. Underwater photos of snorkeling, the kids playing in the pool, everything. Worked like a charm. Simple to use, and the instructions say to rinse it off in clean water when you're done (I never would've thought about that). Definitely worth the $142 bucks.
customer_reviews.author: momoftwo

customer_reviews.title: not working after a year and half :(
customer_reviews.text: I took my camera for underwater pictures and I made sure I double locked the camera so no water gets inside and it was working for first few minutes and than it froze on me. Water still got inside the camera and it is NOT working anymore. I just bought an extra battery to find out if is not just a battery issue and still NOT WORKING :((
customer_reviews.author: Gabcalik

customer_reviews.title: My go-to camera. I'm done with SLRs.
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. Just always be sure to rinse in tap water after using in salt water. This camera is pretty indestructible—just the camera for me. Takes some pretty good pix too.
customer_reviews.author: P. Rasch

customer_reviews.title: Amazing camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera is soo durable , and takes amazing pics. I mainly bought it to use underwater and it is amazing !!! takes great underwater pics and HD vidoes... I love the moments i capture with these. Love this camera...
customer_reviews.author: Seasnoopy

customer_reviews.title: third camera of this type
customer_reviews.text: For the money this is hard to beat. It goes where I go, from heat of a car in the summer, to photo the running dogs in the winter snow. It has been damp, as in forgotten outside and still is going. Normal drops and use is fine. I use my cameras a lot, and if this is laid down someone will steal it. I am not the only one to like it.
customer_reviews.author: arthound

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: When I was looking for another Camera I wasn't expecting the Movie to be in HD. My laptop computer doesn't recognize the format. Nowhere in the advertizements does it mention HD anywhere. If it had, I would have never purchased this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Better you should get a GoPro
customer_reviews.text: Lasted one year before catastrophic failure. Underwater pictures were so-so . Better you should get a GoPro
customer_reviews.author: Arturo Sobellinni

customer_reviews.title: Olympus Camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camera, I use this for work which is commercial diving and we use this camera for still and video. It is easy to use. It takes great underwater pics deeper with the Ikalite housing. A++++ product.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Dont do it
customer_reviews.text: the picture quality is too low, it is tough i have put it through hell, but the crap pics and the slow software make it not worth your time, sorry i really wanted this camera to be better
customer_reviews.author: nico55

customer_reviews.title: Great for outdoor foret to get wet dont take care of the camera...
customer_reviews.text: Great pictures from any activity I took it to the beach and swimming pool... Fun pictures from the kids and wife! Enought for a trip and to take it with you at all times.... records also audio and video of course... SAme olympus quality
customer_reviews.author: Fabricio Recalde

customer_reviews.title: outstanding!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this camera about a month prior to going on a cruise with my wife. I bought a neck lanyard and wore it to every shore excursion we had. On waterslides,in pools, on tubes, in the beach...and performed perfectly! was a little leary the first time it got wet but it did great! AWESOME camera!
customer_reviews.author: chico

customer_reviews.title: Bring your batteries
customer_reviews.text: Picture quality is good enough we could use it as our normal camera. It has survived multiple falls, salt water and all kinds of other abuse. Be sure to have extra batteries though, as they die quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a non waterproof Sony. Nothing wrong with the Sony, just wanted a tough waterproof camera. This is a bit bigger and slightly heavier, but I have taken it in the ocean and white water rafting (class III-IV) and the pictures come out great!
customer_reviews.author: S. Morabit

customer_reviews.title: My 3rd Tough
customer_reviews.text: My 3rd Olympus Tough and I buy these for one reason...I'm not a photographer but I love to take pictures. I don't get into all the specs. I want something simple, tough, and easy to interface with my computer. It does all of the above. Some may find it to be complex or not the most friendly to use. But if I can;t break it then the normal human certainly can't.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Fun for underwater photos and great for kids who like to drop things...
customer_reviews.text: A rugged camera, to be sure, but the operating system does not always get the exposure right in one of the modes while the other modes are fine. Don't ask me which ones, I forgot.
customer_reviews.author: James Petera

customer_reviews.title: Talk about a Muddy Buddy!
customer_reviews.text: I do mud runs all the time and was looking for a camera to take with me. THIS THING IS INCREDIBLE!! To wash it, you submerge it in water for 10 minutes!! There's only one thing I want to know: WHERE HAS THIS CAMERA BEEN MY WHOLE LIFE?!?! I'd give it more than 5 stars if I could!
customer_reviews.author: ijustbuy

customer_reviews.title: A real waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I don't have the patience or the respect for this product to write a long-winded review, so here's the short version: it takes terrible, blurry, pixelated photos. I've taken better photos on a GoPhone. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Nando

customer_reviews.title: Great and durable camera!
customer_reviews.text: Great camera. Very durable. Took it to Mexico when I got married and was able to take underwater pictures of fish and things in the ocean!
customer_reviews.author: KDT

customer_reviews.title: Okay backup... weak primary.
customer_reviews.text: Camera is over rated and pictures are NOT amazing quality. It is fine as a back up camera, but I would be very disappointed if this were my primary camera.
customer_reviews.author: kimberly jacobson

customer_reviews.title: Industrial Tech.
customer_reviews.text: This Camera is great I work in harsh dusty, dirty conditions and this camrea does a great job. I have also used it in the ocean in Aruba on vacation while snorkeling it did great there as well. All I have to say BUY IT you'll love it.
customer_reviews.author: Sig.

customer_reviews.title: camera
customer_reviews.text: I love my camera. I really like how i can use it inside and out and it's accident-proof. it's been exactly what i was looking for. it's blue exterior is nice!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Crane

customer_reviews.title: TOUGH just like the name
customer_reviews.text: This camera has been put through its paces from the lake and river to the coast. It is everything it says it is and then some... Tough tough tough
customer_reviews.author: satx

customer_reviews.title: amazing camera!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing camera, Amazing pictures! The pictures on the camera itself looked pretty descent. But once I uploaded them to my computer the quality was amazing. I think its just the screen on the camera isn't that great. I took this camera to the beach and in the middle of pushing the button to take the picture a wave knocked me over. The picture still came out perfect! I am super pleased I bought this camera, it has lots of functions and extras for you to mess around with if you want.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Camera for Sport and aventure. I'll use in Mountainbike and in my job too. Tha most important is the Camera is waterproof and shockproof with the excellent image.
customer_reviews.author: Cristian Reader Santos Mejia

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera!
customer_reviews.text: I never have to worry about what happens to this camera. Splashes, underwater, drops, it can handle it all. Great pictures and video quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Don't use in salt water!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was my second one of these cause I loved them so much! BUT...we used this for snorkeling in the ocean and it completely rusted out the screen. We even let it soak in fresh water after each dive as suggested.
customer_reviews.author: K. Purdy

customer_reviews.title: tough but low photo quality
customer_reviews.text: i use it to take photos for my open water diver students. the photo quality is as others have reviewed, not good. once i accidentally brought it to 12m, lucky for me no leak. while about its durability, i've brought it for >30 dives now, i'll see how long will it last. rank it 4star as it's cheap (u get what u paid for) and it's convenient since it can go to 10m without a casing.
customer_reviews.author: joseph kuah

customer_reviews.title: Perfect camera to use in sports situations
customer_reviews.text: We take it along on hikes, and in water sports. It is slow in a situation that needs a flash.
customer_reviews.author: AMAZON FAN

customer_reviews.title: Indestructible.
customer_reviews.text: Great little tough camera. My second actually. I still have the other but it's been beat around so much I thought a spare was appropriate.
customer_reviews.author: Jamison Brown

customer_reviews.title: Not Tough Enough
customer_reviews.text: Initially the camera worked well. The shutter action was a little slow, but tolerable, given the camera was waterproof and shockproof. After a few months of use, the camera started shutting down as soon as it started up. Sometimes I can take a couple of pictures and sometimes I can't take any pictures. Battery is fully charged. Overall, the camera would have received an acceptable review, if it had continued to work correctly.
customer_reviews.author: RLB

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera!
customer_reviews.text: This little camera was amazing in the Bahamas. It did everything I needed it to do. Focusing while snorkeling was sometimes an issue but I am blaming that on the water conditions - it was extremely windy and the water was rough.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Best water camera for its price
customer_reviews.text: This camera can take a beating on many of my outings in the woods or in the ocean this camera withstood the beating of my trips
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Olympus Stylus Tough 8010 was the best camera in the market about a year ago. I had to return two cameras already. First one was for water intrusion, the second was for bad SD reader. Not thrilled and will not recommend to anyone. Wish Hero cameras had come out before .
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Morfa

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: When I bought this camera I had the benefit of already having had used the very similar 6010. I love this camera. the picture quality is great, it has all sorts of cool features, including a very good sport mode and a mode where it takes picture continuously as long as you hold the button. The videos are really good quality and it takes good pictures underwater too... I really recommend this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: Product was as described and advertise arrive on time or within the promise arrival time , totally satisfied with my purchase , Price was good
customer_reviews.author: Alex Perez

customer_reviews.title: waterproof camera
customer_reviews.text: hard to use compaired to others that I have. Does work well when used in wet weather. Have not down loaded pictures from vacation yet.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Fuller

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: good product excellent service I hope to continue to improve in order to grow in esat paguina is better than
customer_reviews.author: javier hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: You can really use it under water and works excellent. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Z.

customer_reviews.title: Camera turns on in a "Portrait Mode" instead of intelligent mode. Very frustrating when you want to take ...
customer_reviews.text: Camera turns on in a "Portrait Mode" instead of intelligent mode. Very frustrating when you want to take a quick shot.
customer_reviews.author: John Stephen Ward

customer_reviews.title: in love
customer_reviews.text: I am totally in love with this camera I had an older version of this camera and it got stolen so I finally bought a new one
customer_reviews.author: Happymama

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: We bought this camera before our vacation to Mexico last summer. I read many reviews and some commented on the software being quirky. We have not encountered any of the problems that i read about. It's very durable and worked great while snorkeling.
customer_reviews.author: jessica lynne griffith

customer_reviews.title: Mr James Kreckman
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift to our son for Christmas. But the receipt of package was timely and he enjoyed having a good quality camera
customer_reviews.author: James Kreckman

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: The pictures this camera takes are more sharp & in better detail than I expected for a camera without an SLR lens! I'm pleased!
customer_reviews.author: BijouRoi

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Worst camera I have ever owned. Takes horrible pictures, usually turn out blurred. Takes a long time for the camera to get set up to take a picture. Also, once the battery starts getting a little low the camera will no longer focus at all. This thing belongs in the trash, don't waste your money. The Olympus quality has definately taken a steep dive downward.
customer_reviews.author: Malgirl

customer_reviews.title: Olympus 8010!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best foto camera for this proce. My children are very happy when watching foto take in swimming pool. It's very easy to use and simple funkction.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: cobkai
customer_reviews.text: I've had this camera for over two years. It's survived snowboarding, the beach, and scuba in Cozumel! It has a fantastic flash that creates luminous skin! Highly recommend for adventure seekers! *If you have a problem with it not functioning on, it might be a sand issue. In this case, emerging the whole camera under a facet will do. - Brilliant camera!
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: Olympus Stylus Tough - 8010 shock and water proof camera
customer_reviews.text: What a camera!!! Have used this both for taking swimming pool photo's and video's and for salt water photos's and video's. I can't fault the quality of the results or the camera. The picture is always clear and the camera functions are easy to select. An excellent choice of camera for those normally hazardous shots
customer_reviews.author: NM

customer_reviews.title: Product rating of camera
customer_reviews.text: I own this camera and am very happy with it so purchased two, one of each of my children for Christmas
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: Initial reactions to stylus tough 8010... not good
customer_reviews.text: Bought this puppy to replace a stylus tough 8000.lost in the drink while snorkeling in Balize. The lost camera was terrlfic met all needs and took great pictures underwater and above... just wanted to replace it. Have't yet used this camera, but getting it set up has been time consuming and inconvenient. Manuals and instructions are poor and sketcy. The operating manual is only provided on line and set up is lengthy and unfriendly.
customer_reviews.author: None

customer_reviews.title: Great but slow...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera to replace my Canon D10 Powershot, which failed the very first time I took it into the water. I'm happy with my purchase, but this camera is terribly slow between pictures, which has caused me to miss a fair amount of shots. Other than the speed issue, this is a good, tough camera for all my adventures.
customer_reviews.author: scott fahdt

customer_reviews.title: olympus 8010
customer_reviews.text: The camera is slow on resetting after taking a pitcher and doesn't stay on the last setting when power is turned off. Other than that I'm very pleased with the camera
customer_reviews.author: chuck

customer_reviews.title: Ok camera
customer_reviews.text: Great underwater camera, but overall photos are not that clear.
customer_reviews.author: Mon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Camera
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to operate. Excellent pictures under water and outside. A little difficult to get settings right for indoor pictures and I just could not get the fireworks setting to work properly. That, however was not the reason for the purchase so we are very happy with it. It was great for snorkling and swimming.
customer_reviews.author: Jax

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Good camera but the underwater photos were not true to colo. The functions were decent but there was nothing spectacularly neteworthy about this camera.
customer_reviews.author: laraine reedy

customer_reviews.title: Olympus Stylus Camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera has proven itself time and time again. When I first got it I gave it to my kids who put it through the ringer and it still works good. I would suggest to anybody, who needs a durable camera with good picture quality, to buy this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Nolan Bray

customer_reviews.title: thanks
customer_reviews.text: I took the camera on a family vacation, and loved it. It takes great pics,even better that we could take it in the ocean!
customer_reviews.author: MEL

customer_reviews.title: Awesome camera!
customer_reviews.text: My son is using this camera overseas while on military duty. It takes awesome pictures, easy to use, and tough, not to mention waterproof!
customer_reviews.author: Golfmom

customer_reviews.title: awesome, super durable camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera is everything I thought it would be. It looks good, it's durable, and it takes great quality images. Still trying to figure all of the settings out, but I am enjoying it a lot. Best point and shoot camera out there outside of the Olympus TG810.
customer_reviews.author: nfleet01

customer_reviews.title: Great camra
customer_reviews.text: This camra was amazing great condtion great qualty and the shipping was fast as well. The camra take amazing photos and is well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Perez

customer_reviews.title: Loved the underwater feature but the other features are little complicated
customer_reviews.text: The water feature is a lot of fun to use but the other features and modes are not as user friendly to manuever. I was really hoping for a point and click and its just not that easy. I need to spend a little more time reading the manual.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The camera is only 5 months old and already has a black shady looking mark on the screen. It just appeared there, and wasn't there before and there was no damage to the camera. This is an expensive camera. This shouldn't have happened.
customer_reviews.author: cutsey

product_meta.title: Olympus Stylus Tough 8010 14MP Digital Camera with 5x Wide Angle Zoom and 2.7 inch LCD (Blue)

2.7 inch HyperCrystal TM III LCD display; One touch HD movie (720p); HDMI movie mode
Sensor Shift and Dual Image Stabilization; AF Tracking; Creative Art Filters; Face Detection; Beauty Mode; Perfect Shot Preview
2GB internal memory; USB 2.0 high-speed; SD compatible (card not included), comes with charger
